ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordTypeId = "01270000000QE0y", ISPICKVAL(ESR_Team__c,"Dedicated Service"), ISPICKVAL(ESRService__c,"Lost Client Notification"), ISPICKVAL (Status,"Completed"),
ISPICKVAL( Campaign_Results__c,"" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Campaign Results value selection is Required to save/close the case
